name: part_003
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs the song 'Mikazuki' during her graduation live.
Murasaki Shion performs the song 'Darekana Shinzou ni Naretanara' during her graduation live.

subtitles.original: ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Mikazuki (Crescent Moon)

subtitles.original: 今宵も頭上では 綺麗な満月がゆらゆら
subtitles.english: Tonight as well, a beautiful full moon sways above my head

subtitles.original: 誰かの腕に抱かれて 眠っている
subtitles.english: Sleeping in someone's arms

subtitles.original: 当の私は 独りの夜に 押し潰されては
subtitles.english: As for me, I'm being crushed by the lonely night

subtitles.original: 誰にも見えない 夜闇這いずり回ってる
subtitles.english: Crawling around in the darkness of the night, invisible to anyone

subtitles.original: それでも誰にも負けたくなくて 宇宙の隅でもがいている
subtitles.english: Still, I don't want to lose to anyone, struggling in a corner of the universe

subtitles.original: 追いつきたいや 追い越したいや 夢に見たような世界ね
subtitles.english: I want to catch up, I want to overtake, it's a world like the one I saw in my dreams

subtitles.original: それでも誰かと比べてばっか 周りを見ては立ち止まって
subtitles.english: Still, I'm always comparing myself to others, looking around and stopping

subtitles.original: 欠けたものを探した そんな自分を変えたい
subtitles.english: I searched for what was missing, I want to change that part of myself

subtitles.original: それでもあなたと同じ景色が また見たいから
subtitles.english: But I still want to see the same scenery as you again

subtitles.original: 泣き出したくても 投げ出したくても 諦めたりはできない
subtitles.english: Even if I want to cry, even if I want to give up, I can't abandon it

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに見つかるように サナギは強く手を伸ばすの
subtitles.english: But so that you can find me, the chrysalis reaches out its hand strongly

subtitles.original: 欠けたもの抱きしめて 願いを放つよ ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Embracing what's missing, I'll release my wish, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: それとも誰かに見つけて欲しくて 夜空見上げて叫んでいる
subtitles.english: Or do I just want someone to find me, shouting up at the night sky

subtitles.original: 泣き出したいけど 泣き出さない もう後戻りなどできないね
subtitles.english: I want to cry, but I won't, there's no going back now, right?

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに見つけて欲しくて 蝶のように舞い上がるの
subtitles.english: But I still want you to find me, so I'll soar up like a butterfly

subtitles.original: 欠けた翼で飛ぶよ 醜い星の子 ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: I'll fly with broken wings, an ugly child of the stars, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: 光を放った ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Emitting light, Mikazuki

subtitles.original: 今宵も頭上では 綺麗な満月がキラキラ
subtitles.english: Tonight as well, the beautiful full moon shines brightly above my head

subtitles.original: 次は君の番だと 笑っている
subtitles.english: Smiling, as if saying it's your turn next

subtitles.original: だれかの心臓になれたなら
subtitles.english: If I Could Become Someone's Heart

subtitles.original: こんな泥濘となげくだれかの 生きる理由になれるでしょうか
subtitles.english: Can I become a reason for someone who laments this mire to live?

subtitles.original: これは僕からいま君に贈る 最初で最後のアいの言葉だ
subtitles.english: These are the first and last words of love I send from me to you now

subtitles.original: 街も人も歪みだした 化け物だと気付いたんだ
subtitles.english: The city and people have begun to warp, I realized they were monsters

subtitles.original: 欲動に巣食った愚かさも 全てがこの目に映る
subtitles.english: Even the foolishness that haunts desire, everything is reflected in these eyes

subtitles.original: シアトリカルに手の上で 誰も彼も踊らされる
subtitles.english: Theatrically, in the palm of a hand, everyone and anyone is made to dance

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味だって知らぬまま 形骸化した夢は錆びついてしまった
subtitles.english: Without even knowing the meaning of being born, the hollow dream has rusted away

subtitles.original: 愛をください
subtitles.english: Give me love

subtitles.original: きっと誰もが望んでいた
subtitles.english: I'm sure everyone wanted it

subtitles.original: 愛をください
subtitles.english: Give me love

subtitles.original: そっと震えた手を取って
subtitles.english: Gently take my trembling hand

subtitles.original: 愛をください
subtitles.english: Give me love

subtitles.original: 心臓を抉る
subtitles.english: Gouging out the heart

subtitles.original: 醜いくらいに美しい愛を
subtitles.english: A love so beautiful it's ugly

subtitles.original: こんな泥濘となげくだれかの 生きる理由になれるでしょうか
subtitles.english: Can I become a reason for someone who laments this mire to live?

subtitles.original: いつか終わると気付いてから 仕上げよう僕の心臓を
subtitles.english: After realizing it will end someday, I'll complete my heart
